description: This table contains information about the status and assigned user change history for the Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) reviews in a hospital account.

columns.name: CODING_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the coding record associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this account. Each line represents a change in clinical documentation improvement (CDI) status or assigned user.

columns.name: CDI_HX_ASGN_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores what the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) assigned user is changed to for this account.

columns.name: CDI_HX_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) status changes for this account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Started


In Progress


Physician Query


All Reviews Completed

columns.name: CDI_HX_CHNG_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who makes the change of clinical documentation improvement (CDI) assigned user or status for this account.

columns.name: CDI_HX_CHNG_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant when the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) status or assigned user was changed based on the UTC timezone. Data retrieval should generally occur by using the column CDI_HX_CHG_DTTM, which will return the change instant in local time.

columns.name: CDI_HX_CHNG_DTTM
columns.description: This item shows the instant when the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) status or assigned user was changed based on the system local timezone.

columns.name: CDI_HX_CHNG_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the status change in the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) status history.
